    • Method Detail

      • getBufferSize

        public static Bytes getBufferSize()
        JSch does not do any buffering, so we need to do it ourselves. When the round-trip time gets around 300ms and you're doing one round-trip for every read, it really matters that your buffer size is not just 8KB, which is the default for BufferedInputStream. This default should be good for most cases, just override this function if it's not.
        Returns:
        The size of the buffer.
